main event: A round white object was observed with a smoke trail, descending slowly toward Chitose AB on 25 May 1955.
interesting points: The object fell from an altitude of 3-4,000 feet and appeared to be trying to make a landing., The object emitted no sound during its descent., There were sparks and/or flames trailing from the object., The sighting lasted for about 2 or 3 minutes., The report was made by two reliable Air Force tower operators.
sighted object: one round white object with a smoke trail
